scenario.title: Adding a field to the table with parametrs: <firstName>, <lastName>, <category>, <gender>

examples.step: Given the user is on the Ranorex web page
And the user enter <firstName> into First Name field, <lastName> into Last Name field, chose <category> from the list Category and choose <gender> from Gender
When the user press button Add
Then line is added to the table with the previously entered parameters <firstName> into the field First Name
And line is added to the table with the previously entered parameters <lastName> into the field Last Name
And line is added to the table with the previously entered parameters <gender> into the field Gender
And line is added to the table with the previously entered parameters <category> into the field Category
Given the user is on the Ranorex web pagenet.thucydides.core.webdriver.WebdriverAssertionError: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/json/JSONException
And the user enter 1Fn into First Name field, 1Ln into Last Name field, chose Other from the list Category and choose Female from Gender
When the user press button Add
Then line is added to the table with the previously entered parameters 1Fn into the field First Name
And line is added to the table with the previously entered parameters 1Ln into the field Last Name
And line is added to the table with the previously entered parameters Female into the field Gender
And line is added to the table with the previously entered parameters Other into the field Category
Given the user is on the Ranorex web page
And the user enter 2Fn into First Name field, 2Ln into Last Name field, chose Music from the list Category and choose Female from Gender
When the user press button Add
Then line is added to the table with the previously entered parameters 2Fn into the field First Name
And line is added to the table with the previously entered parameters 2Ln into the field Last Name
And line is added to the table with the previously entered parameters Female into the field Gender
And line is added to the table with the previously entered parameters Music into the field Category

And line is added to the table with the previously entered parameters Movie into the field Category

And the user enter 7Fn into First Name field, 7Ln into Last Name field, chose Other from the list Category and choose Male from Gender

And line is added to the table with the previously entered parameters 7Ln into the field Last Name
And line is added to the table with the previously entered parameters Male into the field Gender
And line is added to the table with the previously entered parameters Other into the field Category
